availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry D. Mathis (Louisville, Kentucky, cabinet maker and grocer)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, cabinet maker and grocer. Kentucky native. Married to Delphia Burke Mathis in Nelson County, Kentucky, on September 8, 1842. Cabinetmaker in Nelson County in 1850. Grocer in Louisville in 1858. Grocer in partnership with William Duncan in Louisville from 1859 to 1861. Grocer in Louisville from 1862 to 1864. Grocer in partnership with J.B.F. Gray in Louisville in 1864.
